definition: loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)

sentences.english: Your intended recipients will be able to unscramble it with ease.
sentences.chinese: 您预期的收件人将能够轻松地解读它。

sentences.english: It was not easy to work in the shed;in winter it was a veritable ice-box.
sentences.chinese: 在这木棚里工作可不轻松，冬天简直是个冰箱。

sentences.english: We give them a sense of humor because laughter leaven life.
sentences.chinese: 我们要给予他们幽默感，因为笑声可以使生活更轻松。

sentences.english: The gift can be something made or bought from a gift shop.
sentences.chinese: 能很轻松的礼物或买一家礼品店。

sentences.english: Easy handle rooming list of group.
sentences.chinese: 轻松处理团队客人分房。

sentences.english: Rolling code for anti-lost its ultra-thin compact allows you to ease, handy.
sentences.chinese: 滚动码防丢器其小巧超薄让您轻松自如，得心应手。

sentences.english: No transition is ever smooth or easy.
sentences.chinese: 不曾有过平顺或轻松的过渡。

sentences.english: Ah, I said, when we these children can easily lives?
sentences.chinese: 哎，我说，何时我们这些命苦的小孩才能轻松呢？

sentences.english: She admits that her life is not a fairy tale and that she faces many challenges.
sentences.chinese: 她坦承她的生活并非童话般轻松，而要面对很多挑战。

sentences.english: When you stop SPINNING, it's always good to ease into a couple strokes of regular backstroke.
sentences.chinese: 转臂游结束后，最好放轻松游几下正常的仰泳。

sentences.english: We’ll only relax when we know you’re all safe.
sentences.chinese: 我们只有知道你们都平安才会轻松下来。

sentences.english: She bid me take life easy, as the grass grows on the weirs.
sentences.chinese: 当青草在河岸滋长的时候，她嘱咐我要轻松的去生活。

sentences.english: People enjoy a few frivolities during their holidays.
sentences.chinese: 人们在假期里轻松地娱乐一番。

sentences.english: This is an open top outrigger kayak that converts into a tent with ease.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个开放前支腿皮艇可以转换成轻松帐篷。

sentences.english: The fire puja went well effortlessly from beginning to the end.
sentences.chinese: 火供从头至尾很轻松的进行得很顺利。

sentences.english: Put your foot on here. Take it easy.
sentences.chinese: 把你的脚放上去，放轻松。

definition: at ease/to feel relieved/to set one's mind at rest/to keep one's mind on sth
to want to/to feel like/to fancy/to care for sb/desirous of
